RelatedSentence: Africa Command has reached deal with the Nigerian military for sharing intelligence gleaned from surveillance by American spy aircraft in the hunt for the schoolgirls abducted by Boko Haram .
Africa Command has reached deal with the Nigerian military for sharing intelligence gleaned from surveillance by American spy aircraft in the hunt for the schoolgirls abducted by Boko Haram .
We have finalized agreements with the Nigerians for sharing intelligence with them , specifically related to the kidnapped girls , Army Col. Steve Warren , a Pentagon spokesman , said Monday .
